name: @dhis2/d2-ui-period-selector-dialog
description: Period selector dialog component for DHIS2
author: Ilya Nee <ilya@dhis2.org>

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir build/cjs --ignore spec.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir build/es --ignore spec.js
